title: Kate Bosworth keeps it casual cool in grey T-shirt and slouchy jeans
text:
She's spending her day with her four-legged best friend.

Kate Bosworth, 36, stepped out into the sunshine on Saturday morning while stopping at a local pet shop in Los Angeles before heading out to spend the day with her dog.

The Remember the Titans actress kept it casual before heading out on a walk with her dog off leash as the two ran and played together.

Weekend fun! Kate Bosworth stepped out into the sunshine on Saturday morning while stopping at a local pet shop in Los Angeles before heading out to spend the day with her dog

She looked effortlessly chic in a plain gray t-shirt and a pair of high-waisted boyfriend jeans.

Bosworth wore a pair of tan sandals and had on a pair of sunglasses as she ran her errands before handing out with the pup.

The two appeared to be having a great time while on their weekend adventure.

Weekend attire: She looked effortlessly chic in a plain gray t-shirt and a pair of high-waisted boyfriend jeans

Girl's best friend: The two appeared to be having a great time while on their weekend adventure

Kate typically keeps a low profile, but has been back in the spotlight after promoting her new Netflix series, the I-Land.

While promoting the series back in September, Kate reflected on her breakup with Orlando Bloom, 42, on Watch What Happens Live.

The two dated back in 2006 and had an on-again-off-again relationship since 2003 and revealed the relationship was a bit wild saying: 'Oh my God! I knew this was going to be a crazy one.'

Back then: Orlando Bloom and Kate smile at the after-party for the premiere of Superman Returns back in June 2006

But, it looks like it all worked out for her in the end as she claims she 'married a director' who is none other than her husband, Michael Polish, 48.

She went on to say that dating an actor is 'too much of the same thing' when she recalled her relationship with the Hollywood hunk who is now engaged to singer Katy Perry, 34.

Bosworth insists that while both of them have since moved on, they are still good friends.
